library.description: It's a small library to provide the I18n translations on the Javascript. It comes with Rails support.
library.name: i18n-js

library.description: Polyglot.js is a tiny I18n helper library written in JavaScript, made to work both in the browser and in CommonJS environments (Node). It provides a simple solution for interpolation and pluralization, based off of Airbnb's experience adding I18n functionality to its Backbone.js and Node apps. Polyglot has zero dependencies.
library.name: Polyglot.js

library.description: i18next is a full-featured i18n javascript library for translating your webapplication.
library.name: i18next

library.description: Gettext Style i18n for Modern JavaScript Apps.
library.name: Jed

library.description: ICU MessageFormat for Javascript - i18n Plural and Gender Capable Messages
library.name: messageformat.js

library.description: Standalone port of Google Closure's NumberFormat.
library.name: numberformat.js

library.description: jsIn is a lightweight (769Bytes! No other libraries/framework required!) and easy-to-use JavaScript code module to implement string translation for i18n (internationalization) purpose.
library.name: jsIn

library.description: Localization your webpages by using AJAX.
library.name: l10n-by-javascript

library.description:
BabelBox is a small internationalization library that makes it easy to support multiple languages.

Created to work in harmony with requirejs and allows async modules to be loaded with their respective language files, without having to manually load or manipulate tokens.
library.name: BabelBox

library.description: Compatibility implementation of the ECMAScript Internationalization API (ECMA-402) for JavaScript.
library.name: Intl.js
